saveOnPageChange.label: Background Save On Page Change
saveOnPageChange.helpText: Form will save on page change

focusMode.label: Focus After Page Change Mode
focusMode.helpText: Smart focus sets focus to navigator if present. If not, find first heading.

transitionDelay.label: Page Transition Delay
transitionDelay.helpText: Provide how long the duration of the page transition will be

restartAtLastSavedPage.label: Restart At Last Saved Page
restartAtLastSavedPage.helpText: If checked, the form will return to the page it was on after save and resume.

ruleTemplates.name: Page change
ruleTemplates.msg: a script to run when the user navigates between pages. Use the info parameter to access the id of the page navigated to and from.
